line_1: Thy half-writ Scrolls all eaten by the Moth:
line_2: Come, lig no more upon the Bed of Sloth,

line_1: Thy half-writ Scrolls all eaten by the Moth:
line_2: Fond to begin but still to finish loth,

line_1: Thy half-writ Scrolls all eaten by the Moth:
line_2: Who with the Sons of Softness nobly wroth,
